name: Serf
firstNightReminder: Wake up the Serf and have them choose another player, then indicate the number of steps from the choosen player to the Outsider seated closest to them.
otherNightReminder: Wake up the Serf and have them choose another player, then indicate the number of steps from the choosen player to the Outsider seated closest to them.
ability: Each night, choose another player; you learn how many steps from them to the closest Outsider. [At least 1 Outsider]
